the argentineans ripped the beleaguered serbs to shreds after responding to coach jose pekerman 's call for more control of the game . as the south american 's main playmaker juan roman riquelme received the close man-to-man attention of albert nadj , it was up to the rest of the side to inject their creativity into the match . the argentines did just that with their first solid goal chance in front of the serbia montenegro goal six minutes into the match when maxi rodriguez slid a pass into the penalty area from javier saviola past dragoslav jevric and tallied his first of two goals on the day . in 31st minute , saviola , who claimed man of the match honors for repeatedly tearing through defenders , and juan riquelme combined in a fluid cross field movement from the left that found right wing esteban cambiasso on the edge of the penalty area . the midfielder scored on a left-footed volley after a glorious one-two with crespo , who fed cambiasso with a back-heeled pass . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : argentina 's gabriel heinze , center , was a bit ahead for the whole game gonzalez made it three just before half time , after saviola poached the ball from a serb player near the corner post and ran around the defense to feed hernan crespo with a low cross . the chelsea striker was deprived by a gaggle of serb defenders and goalkeeper but the ball ran across to gonzalez , who side footed his shot off the post for argentina 's third . argentine keeper left with nothing to do serbia-montenegro 's strikers were largely denied by argentina 's well organized defense , backed by a confident abbondanzieri in goal and appeared demoralized by half time . the serbs struggled to contain the argentinean tide at the back despite the slower pace of the game , showed little creativity and appeared blunted in the second half . in his first world cup appearance , 18-year-old lionel messi was fouled on virtually his first touch of the ball after coming on in the 75th minute .
the youngster latched on to the swiftly taken free kick to feed crespo with an inch-perfect cross to crespo for argentina 's fifth carlos tevez , who replaced saviola midway through the second half , dribbled past two defenders and curled his shot past jevric , while messi , hailed as maradona 's heir , marked his return from injury with his first world cup goal in only 15 minutes on the pitch . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de weakened serbia & montenegro ripe for argentinean plucking two-time world cup winners argentina , buoyed by three points from their first game against ivory coast , on friday take on a serbia-montenegro side severely weakened by the loss of defensive pillar nemanja vidic .

live ticker : netherland 2:1 ivory coast -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 16.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 23.03.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 16.06.2006 live ticker : netherland 2:1 ivory coast review all the game 's action with the dw-world.de live ticker . a packed stadium in stuttgart will watch the contest .
the netherlands go through to the next round with a win .
ivory coast , meanwhile , are fighting for survival .
the netherlands start with : van der sar , heitinga , ooijer , mathijsen , van bronckhorst , van bommel , sneijder , cocu , van persie , van nistelrooy , robben ivory coast 's first eleven : tizie , eboue , k. toure , meite , boka , y. toure , zokora , romaric , a. kone , drogba , b. kone the referee is oscar ruiz from columbia .
1. min .
the match begins with the netherlands first on the ball .
3. min .
a cautious start by both sides , who know there 's a lot on the line .
5. min .
van histelrooy ca n't quite reach a van bommel cross directly in front of ivory coast 's goal .
7. min .
ivory coast 's defense looks a bit unsure , especially on long balls .
10. min .
little rhythm on display here , with lots of niggling fouls and misdirected passes .
12. min .
eboue hits the ground in the box , but ruiz says , play on .
15. min .
romaric tries one from long distance but no problem for van der sar .
16. min .
a. kone hits the side netting .
ivory coast with more of the ball now .
20. min .
the netherlands ' midfield is practically invisible , as the oranjes try their luck with long balls .
21. min .
goal for the netherlands ! ! ! ! !
van persie with an explosive free-kick from the edge of the box .
23. min .
zokoro booked , after van persie 's goal opens the match up .
26. min .
goal for the netherlands ! ! ! ! ! ! 2-nil .
van nistelrooy hits pay dirt after a lovely solo run by robben .
27. min .
no more lethargy here after a pair of goals for the netherlands .
ivory coast will have to do more .
31. min .
sloppy passing kills an incipient ivory coast attack .
32. min .
zokora hits the bar with a powerful blast from just outside the box .
33. min .
robben booked for diving .
replay shows there was contact .
34. min .
and yellow for mathijsen as well .
36. min .
what was a snoozer has developed nicely , with ivory coast trying to narrow the deficit .
37. min .
goal for ivory coast ! ! ! !
b. kone pushes the ball up the right and fires a rocket into the upper left-hand corner .
40. min .
drogba sees yellow after contact with van der sar .
drogba misses next match .
a bitter blow for ivory coast .
42. min .
drogba on the breakaway , but his pass to a. kone came too late .
44. min .
netherlands with a corner-kick but ivory coast clear easily .
45. min .
a. kone lifts a shot over the bar .
45. min . + 2 the netherlands lead 2-1 at half-time , but ivory coast are gaining momentum .
the second half should be a real corker .
46. min .
boulahrouz for heitinga 46. min .
the second half kicks off .
ivory coast have first possession .
47. min .
van persie with the half 's first shot on goal .
49. min .
k. toure with a long free-kick , but van der sar scoops it up .
49. min .
van der vaart replaces sneijder 50. min .
van nistelrooy tests tizie .
53. min .
eboue with a chance from 4 meters out but mathijsen blocks the shot .
54. min .
sloppy play in the netherlands ' midfield is giving ivory coast opportunities .
56. min .
yellow card for van bommel .
61. min .
yapi-yapo and didane for romaric and b. kone fresh legs for ivory coast 63. min .
dutch coach marco van basten exhorts his players to increase the tempo .
65. min .
boka is booked after tripping van persie from behind .
67. min .
netherlands will try to catch ivory coast on the counter-attack , while ivory coast need at least one more goal .
69. min .
robben fires from short range but tizie parries .
72. min .
landzaat for van nistelrooy akale for a. kone both teams with substitutions .
75. min .
the final fifteen minutes , with the result hanging on a knife 's edge .
76. min .
van persie clears on the line after an ivory coast corner .
that was close .
78. min .
the netherlands have withdrawn into their own half of the pitch .
81. min .
ivory coast in complete control of the ball but with problems penetrating the penalty area .
84. min .
robben counter-attacks but pulls his shot over the goal .
87. min .
ivory coast make little headway against the dutch defense .
88. min .
long ball to drogba rolls out of bounds .
90. min .
at the end of regulation time , ivory coast have the ball .
90. min .
three minutes injury time .
90. min . + 1 ivory coast corner-kick sails well over the box .
90. min .
cocu + 3 final free-kick for ivory coast comes to naught .
90. min .
netherlands win 2-1 ! + 4 the dutch are through to the next round , while ivory coast are out .
van persie was the best man for the oranjes , and bakary kone for ivory coast , in a close , close match . dw staff -lrb- cha -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

" klinsmania " threatening to steal kaiser 's thunder -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 16.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 15.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 16.06.2006 " klinsmania " threatening to steal kaiser 's thunder großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : is he the next kaiser ?
franz beckenbauer is germany 's undisputed king of soccer … or is he ?
with germany advancing to the second round of the world cup , national coach jürgen klinsmann is making a run for the kaiser 's crown . beckenbauer has faithfully attended every match so far in the world cup , but for the moment his thunder is being stolen by national coach jurgen klinsmann . while beckenbauer , nicknamed ' the kaiser ' , is every inch a german patriot , he could be forgiven for feeling that his role as head of the world cup organizing committee is being steamrollered by the klinsmann express after the german team reached the second round . the german media is also enthralled with a kind of freedom and freshness in the german side that has n't been there for years - a factor many people are putting down to the free spirit klinsmann has developed since he made the united states his home . california-style coach bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : why is klinsmann suddenly so popular ?
of course , many in german football circles have taken issue with the fact that the 41-year-old is now commuting from california , including beckenbauer himself , who publicly grumbled about klinsmann 's absence at a soccer workshop held in march . " jurgen klinsmann should have been here , " beckenbauer said .
" this is a meeting he had to make and there are not too many of them . " klinsmann , who was also called to account over that by several other notable figures and had to hold emergency talks over the issue of his absences , took note and announced shortly afterwards he would be spending more time in his homeland . it was not the first time that the two had clashed .
ironically , it was when klinsmann was a player for bayern munich , coached by none other than the kaiser , that the two had a difference of opinion . though beckenbauer did not name klinsmann specifically , he cited several players behaving as if they were playing for " fc hollywood . " klinsmann , 108-times capped and scorer of 47 goals for germany , defends his trips home to california on the basis that he is always in touch through e-mail .
but this led to one paper , the berliner zeitung dubbing him " the california internet coach . " confident klinsmann klinsmann knows the best way to answer the critics is by lifting the world cup on july 9 and achieving his goal of emulating beckenbauer by winning the world cup as both a player and manager . proving he 's in tune with the new mood of optimism and patriotism currently sweeping germany , klinsmann even said he 's already booked hotel rooms for the day of the final in berlin on july 9 . beckenbauer , on the other hand , has played a more cautious game saying a quarter-final spot is the very least germany should achieve . dw staff / afp -lrb- dc -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de national team coach says he 'll spend more time in germany coach jürgen klinsmann , who has been under fire for spending much of his off-the-field time in california , answered critics by saying on sunday he would spend most of his time in germany until the start of the world cup .
-lrb- march 12 , 2006 -rrb- beckenbauer scolds germany 's klinsmann just days after criticism rained down following the 1-4 loss to italy , germany coach jürgen klinsmann was reprimanded by soccer king franz beckenbauer for skipping an important meeting of world cup coaches in germany .
-lrb- march 7 , 2006 -rrb- klinsmann gets merkel 's vote of confidence under-fire germany manager jürgen klinsmann received a vote of confidence from an unlikely quarter when chancellor angela merkel told him wednesday she was rooting for him .
-lrb- march 16 , 2006 -rrb- feedback who deserves to be germany 's soccer kaiser - beckenbauer or klinsmann ?
send us an e-mail .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 16.06.2006 " klinsmania " threatening to steal kaiser 's thunder großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : is he the next kaiser ?
franz beckenbauer is germany 's undisputed king of soccer … or is he ?
with germany advancing to the second round of the world cup , national coach jürgen klinsmann is making a run for the kaiser 's crown . beckenbauer has faithfully attended every match so far in the world cup , but for the moment his thunder is being stolen by national coach jurgen klinsmann . while beckenbauer , nicknamed ' the kaiser ' , is every inch a german patriot , he could be forgiven for feeling that his role as head of the world cup organizing committee is being steamrollered by the klinsmann express after the german team reached the second round . the german media is also enthralled with a kind of freedom and freshness in the german side that has n't been there for years - a factor many people are putting down to the free spirit klinsmann has developed since he made the united states his home . california-style coach bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : why is klinsmann suddenly so popular ?
of course , many in german football circles have taken issue with the fact that the 41-year-old is now commuting from california , including beckenbauer himself , who publicly grumbled about klinsmann 's absence at a soccer workshop held in march . " jurgen klinsmann should have been here , " beckenbauer said .
" this is a meeting he had to make and there are not too many of them . " klinsmann , who was also called to account over that by several other notable figures and had to hold emergency talks over the issue of his absences , took note and announced shortly afterwards he would be spending more time in his homeland . it was not the first time that the two had clashed .
ironically , it was when klinsmann was a player for bayern munich , coached by none other than the kaiser , that the two had a difference of opinion . though beckenbauer did not name klinsmann specifically , he cited several players behaving as if they were playing for " fc hollywood . " klinsmann , 108-times capped and scorer of 47 goals for germany , defends his trips home to california on the basis that he is always in touch through e-mail .
but this led to one paper , the berliner zeitung dubbing him " the california internet coach . " confident klinsmann klinsmann knows the best way to answer the critics is by lifting the world cup on july 9 and achieving his goal of emulating beckenbauer by winning the world cup as both a player and manager . proving he 's in tune with the new mood of optimism and patriotism currently sweeping germany , klinsmann even said he 's already booked hotel rooms for the day of the final in berlin on july 9 . beckenbauer , on the other hand , has played a more cautious game saying a quarter-final spot is the very least germany should achieve . dw staff / afp -lrb- dc -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de national team coach says he 'll spend more time in germany coach jürgen klinsmann , who has been under fire for spending much of his off-the-field time in california , answered critics by saying on sunday he would spend most of his time in germany until the start of the world cup .
-lrb- march 12 , 2006 -rrb- beckenbauer scolds germany 's klinsmann just days after criticism rained down following the 1-4 loss to italy , germany coach jürgen klinsmann was reprimanded by soccer king franz beckenbauer for skipping an important meeting of world cup coaches in germany .
-lrb- march 7 , 2006 -rrb- klinsmann gets merkel 's vote of confidence under-fire germany manager jürgen klinsmann received a vote of confidence from an unlikely quarter when chancellor angela merkel told him wednesday she was rooting for him .
-lrb- march 16 , 2006 -rrb- feedback who deserves to be germany 's soccer kaiser - beckenbauer or klinsmann ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 16.06.2006 " klinsmania " threatening to steal kaiser 's thunder großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : is he the next kaiser ?
franz beckenbauer is germany 's undisputed king of soccer … or is he ?
with germany advancing to the second round of the world cup , national coach jürgen klinsmann is making a run for the kaiser 's crown . beckenbauer has faithfully attended every match so far in the world cup , but for the moment his thunder is being stolen by national coach jurgen klinsmann . while beckenbauer , nicknamed ' the kaiser ' , is every inch a german patriot , he could be forgiven for feeling that his role as head of the world cup organizing committee is being steamrollered by the klinsmann express after the german team reached the second round . the german media is also enthralled with a kind of freedom and freshness in the german side that has n't been there for years - a factor many people are putting down to the free spirit klinsmann has developed since he made the united states his home . california-style coach bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : why is klinsmann suddenly so popular ?
of course , many in german football circles have taken issue with the fact that the 41-year-old is now commuting from california , including beckenbauer himself , who publicly grumbled about klinsmann 's absence at a soccer workshop held in march . " jurgen klinsmann should have been here , " beckenbauer said .
" this is a meeting he had to make and there are not too many of them . " klinsmann , who was also called to account over that by several other notable figures and had to hold emergency talks over the issue of his absences , took note and announced shortly afterwards he would be spending more time in his homeland . it was not the first time that the two had clashed .
ironically , it was when klinsmann was a player for bayern munich , coached by none other than the kaiser , that the two had a difference of opinion . though beckenbauer did not name klinsmann specifically , he cited several players behaving as if they were playing for " fc hollywood . " klinsmann , 108-times capped and scorer of 47 goals for germany , defends his trips home to california on the basis that he is always in touch through e-mail .
but this led to one paper , the berliner zeitung dubbing him " the california internet coach . " confident klinsmann klinsmann knows the best way to answer the critics is by lifting the world cup on july 9 and achieving his goal of emulating beckenbauer by winning the world cup as both a player and manager . proving he 's in tune with the new mood of optimism and patriotism currently sweeping germany , klinsmann even said he 's already booked hotel rooms for the day of the final in berlin on july 9 . beckenbauer , on the other hand , has played a more cautious game saying a quarter-final spot is the very least germany should achieve . dw staff / afp -lrb- dc -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de national team coach says he 'll spend more time in germany coach jürgen klinsmann , who has been under fire for spending much of his off-the-field time in california , answered critics by saying on sunday he would spend most of his time in germany until the start of the world cup .
-lrb- march 12 , 2006 -rrb- beckenbauer scolds germany 's klinsmann just days after criticism rained down following the 1-4 loss to italy , germany coach jürgen klinsmann was reprimanded by soccer king franz beckenbauer for skipping an important meeting of world cup coaches in germany .
-lrb- march 7 , 2006 -rrb- klinsmann gets merkel 's vote of confidence under-fire germany manager jürgen klinsmann received a vote of confidence from an unlikely quarter when chancellor angela merkel told him wednesday she was rooting for him .
-lrb- march 16 , 2006 -rrb- feedback who deserves to be germany 's soccer kaiser - beckenbauer or klinsmann ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 16.06.2006 " klinsmania " threatening to steal kaiser 's thunder großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : is he the next kaiser ?
franz beckenbauer is germany 's undisputed king of soccer … or is he ?
with germany advancing to the second round of the world cup , national coach jürgen klinsmann is making a run for the kaiser 's crown . beckenbauer has faithfully attended every match so far in the world cup , but for the moment his thunder is being stolen by national coach jurgen klinsmann . while beckenbauer , nicknamed ' the kaiser ' , is every inch a german patriot , he could be forgiven for feeling that his role as head of the world cup organizing committee is being steamrollered by the klinsmann express after the german team reached the second round . the german media is also enthralled with a kind of freedom and freshness in the german side that has n't been there for years - a factor many people are putting down to the free spirit klinsmann has developed since he made the united states his home . california-style coach bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : why is klinsmann suddenly so popular ?
of course , many in german football circles have taken issue with the fact that the 41-year-old is now commuting from california , including beckenbauer himself , who publicly grumbled about klinsmann 's absence at a soccer workshop held in march . " jurgen klinsmann should have been here , " beckenbauer said .
" this is a meeting he had to make and there are not too many of them . " klinsmann , who was also called to account over that by several other notable figures and had to hold emergency talks over the issue of his absences , took note and announced shortly afterwards he would be spending more time in his homeland . it was not the first time that the two had clashed .
ironically , it was when klinsmann was a player for bayern munich , coached by none other than the kaiser , that the two had a difference of opinion . though beckenbauer did not name klinsmann specifically , he cited several players behaving as if they were playing for " fc hollywood . " klinsmann , 108-times capped and scorer of 47 goals for germany , defends his trips home to california on the basis that he is always in touch through e-mail .
but this led to one paper , the berliner zeitung dubbing him " the california internet coach . " confident klinsmann klinsmann knows the best way to answer the critics is by lifting the world cup on july 9 and achieving his goal of emulating beckenbauer by winning the world cup as both a player and manager . proving he 's in tune with the new mood of optimism and patriotism currently sweeping germany , klinsmann even said he 's already booked hotel rooms for the day of the final in berlin on july 9 . beckenbauer , on the other hand , has played a more cautious game saying a quarter-final spot is the very least germany should achieve . dw staff / afp -lrb- dc -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de national team coach says he 'll spend more time in germany coach jürgen klinsmann , who has been under fire for spending much of his off-the-field time in california , answered critics by saying on sunday he would spend most of his time in germany until the start of the world cup .
-lrb- march 12 , 2006 -rrb- beckenbauer scolds germany 's klinsmann just days after criticism rained down following the 1-4 loss to italy , germany coach jürgen klinsmann was reprimanded by soccer king franz beckenbauer for skipping an important meeting of world cup coaches in germany .
-lrb- march 7 , 2006 -rrb- klinsmann gets merkel 's vote of confidence under-fire germany manager jürgen klinsmann received a vote of confidence from an unlikely quarter when chancellor angela merkel told him wednesday she was rooting for him .
-lrb- march 16 , 2006 -rrb- feedback who deserves to be germany 's soccer kaiser - beckenbauer or klinsmann ?

" klinsmania " threatening to steal kaiser 's thunder -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 16.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 23.03.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 16.06.2006 " klinsmania " threatening to steal kaiser 's thunder großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : is he the next kaiser ?
franz beckenbauer is germany 's undisputed king of soccer … or is he ?
with germany advancing to the second round of the world cup , national coach jürgen klinsmann is making a run for the kaiser 's crown . beckenbauer has faithfully attended every match so far in the world cup , but for the moment his thunder is being stolen by national coach jurgen klinsmann . while beckenbauer , nicknamed ' the kaiser ' , is every inch a german patriot , he could be forgiven for feeling that his role as head of the world cup organizing committee is being steamrollered by the klinsmann express after the german team reached the second round . the german media is also enthralled with a kind of freedom and freshness in the german side that has n't been there for years - a factor many people are putting down to the free spirit klinsmann has developed since he made the united states his home . california-style coach bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : why is klinsmann suddenly so popular ?
of course , many in german football circles have taken issue with the fact that the 41-year-old is now commuting from california , including beckenbauer himself , who publicly grumbled about klinsmann 's absence at a soccer workshop held in march . " jurgen klinsmann should have been here , " beckenbauer said .
" this is a meeting he had to make and there are not too many of them . " klinsmann , who was also called to account over that by several other notable figures and had to hold emergency talks over the issue of his absences , took note and announced shortly afterwards he would be spending more time in his homeland . it was not the first time that the two had clashed .
ironically , it was when klinsmann was a player for bayern munich , coached by none other than the kaiser , that the two had a difference of opinion . though beckenbauer did not name klinsmann specifically , he cited several players behaving as if they were playing for " fc hollywood . " klinsmann , 108-times capped and scorer of 47 goals for germany , defends his trips home to california on the basis that he is always in touch through e-mail .
but this led to one paper , the berliner zeitung dubbing him " the california internet coach . " confident klinsmann klinsmann knows the best way to answer the critics is by lifting the world cup on july 9 and achieving his goal of emulating beckenbauer by winning the world cup as both a player and manager . proving he 's in tune with the new mood of optimism and patriotism currently sweeping germany , klinsmann even said he 's already booked hotel rooms for the day of the final in berlin on july 9 . beckenbauer , on the other hand , has played a more cautious game saying a quarter-final spot is the very least germany should achieve . dw staff / afp -lrb- dc -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de national team coach says he 'll spend more time in germany coach jürgen klinsmann , who has been under fire for spending much of his off-the-field time in california , answered critics by saying on sunday he would spend most of his time in germany until the start of the world cup .
-lrb- march 12 , 2006 -rrb- beckenbauer scolds germany 's klinsmann just days after criticism rained down following the 1-4 loss to italy , germany coach jürgen klinsmann was reprimanded by soccer king franz beckenbauer for skipping an important meeting of world cup coaches in germany .
-lrb- march 7 , 2006 -rrb- klinsmann gets merkel 's vote of confidence under-fire germany manager jürgen klinsmann received a vote of confidence from an unlikely quarter when chancellor angela merkel told him wednesday she was rooting for him .
-lrb- march 16 , 2006 -rrb- feedback who deserves to be germany 's soccer kaiser - beckenbauer or klinsmann ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply . radio news listen to world headlines from the top of the hour dw-world.de check out our latest interactive web features dw screensaver social bookmarking our rss feeds dw widgets integrated search dw on facebook newsletters netvibes.com the way you want it mobile optimized for pdas newsletters news in your inbox audio / video podcasts © dw 2011 deutsche welle is not responsible for the content of external websites .

" klinsmania " threatening to steal kaiser 's thunder -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 16.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 25.04.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 16.06.2006 " klinsmania " threatening to steal kaiser 's thunder großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : is he the next kaiser ?
franz beckenbauer is germany 's undisputed king of soccer … or is he ?
with germany advancing to the second round of the world cup , national coach jürgen klinsmann is making a run for the kaiser 's crown . beckenbauer has faithfully attended every match so far in the world cup , but for the moment his thunder is being stolen by national coach jurgen klinsmann . while beckenbauer , nicknamed ' the kaiser ' , is every inch a german patriot , he could be forgiven for feeling that his role as head of the world cup organizing committee is being steamrollered by the klinsmann express after the german team reached the second round . the german media is also enthralled with a kind of freedom and freshness in the german side that has n't been there for years - a factor many people are putting down to the free spirit klinsmann has developed since he made the united states his home . california-style coach bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : why is klinsmann suddenly so popular ?
of course , many in german football circles have taken issue with the fact that the 41-year-old is now commuting from california , including beckenbauer himself , who publicly grumbled about klinsmann 's absence at a soccer workshop held in march . " jurgen klinsmann should have been here , " beckenbauer said .
" this is a meeting he had to make and there are not too many of them . " klinsmann , who was also called to account over that by several other notable figures and had to hold emergency talks over the issue of his absences , took note and announced shortly afterwards he would be spending more time in his homeland . it was not the first time that the two had clashed .
ironically , it was when klinsmann was a player for bayern munich , coached by none other than the kaiser , that the two had a difference of opinion . though beckenbauer did not name klinsmann specifically , he cited several players behaving as if they were playing for " fc hollywood . " klinsmann , 108-times capped and scorer of 47 goals for germany , defends his trips home to california on the basis that he is always in touch through e-mail .
but this led to one paper , the berliner zeitung dubbing him " the california internet coach . " confident klinsmann klinsmann knows the best way to answer the critics is by lifting the world cup on july 9 and achieving his goal of emulating beckenbauer by winning the world cup as both a player and manager . proving he 's in tune with the new mood of optimism and patriotism currently sweeping germany , klinsmann even said he 's already booked hotel rooms for the day of the final in berlin on july 9 . beckenbauer , on the other hand , has played a more cautious game saying a quarter-final spot is the very least germany should achieve . dw staff / afp -lrb- dc -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de national team coach says he 'll spend more time in germany coach jürgen klinsmann , who has been under fire for spending much of his off-the-field time in california , answered critics by saying on sunday he would spend most of his time in germany until the start of the world cup .
-lrb- march 12 , 2006 -rrb- beckenbauer scolds germany 's klinsmann just days after criticism rained down following the 1-4 loss to italy , germany coach jürgen klinsmann was reprimanded by soccer king franz beckenbauer for skipping an important meeting of world cup coaches in germany .
-lrb- march 7 , 2006 -rrb- klinsmann gets merkel 's vote of confidence under-fire germany manager jürgen klinsmann received a vote of confidence from an unlikely quarter when chancellor angela merkel told him wednesday she was rooting for him .
-lrb- march 16 , 2006 -rrb- feedback who deserves to be germany 's soccer kaiser - beckenbauer or klinsmann ?
send us an e-mail .

of course , many in german football circles have taken issue with the fact that the 41-year-old is now commuting from california , including beckenbauer himself , who publicly grumbled about klinsmann 's absence at a soccer workshop held in march . " jurgen klinsmann should have been here , " beckenbauer said .
" this is a meeting he had to make and there are not too many of them . " klinsmann , who was also called to account over that by several other notable figures and had to hold emergency talks over the issue of his absences , took note and announced shortly afterwards he would be spending more time in his homeland . it was not the first time that the two had clashed .
ironically , it was when klinsmann was a player for bayern munich , coached by none other than the kaiser , that the two had a difference of opinion . though beckenbauer did not name klinsmann specifically , he cited several players behaving as if they were playing for " fc hollywood . " klinsmann , 108-times capped and scorer of 47 goals for germany , defends his trips home to california on the basis that he is always in touch through e-mail .
but this led to one paper , the berliner zeitung dubbing him " the california internet coach . " confident klinsmann klinsmann knows the best way to answer the critics is by lifting the world cup on july 9 and achieving his goal of emulating beckenbauer by winning the world cup as both a player and manager . proving he 's in tune with the new mood of optimism and patriotism currently sweeping germany , klinsmann even said he 's already booked hotel rooms for the day of the final in berlin on july 9 . beckenbauer , on the other hand , has played a more cautious game saying a quarter-final spot is the very least germany should achieve . dw staff / afp -lrb- dc -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de national team coach says he 'll spend more time in germany coach jürgen klinsmann , who has been under fire for spending much of his off-the-field time in california , answered critics by saying on sunday he would spend most of his time in germany until the start of the world cup .

live ticker : argentina 6:0 serbia and montenegro -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 16.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 15.09.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 16.06.2006 live ticker : argentina 6:0 serbia and montenegro review all the action from the match with the dw-world.de live ticker . the next match on dw-world.de 's live ticker argentina play serbia & montenegro in the first of the second round of group c matches .
a sell-out crowd of 52,000 is on hand in gelsenkirchen to watch favored argentina take on serbia-montenegro .
argentina 's starting line-up abbondanzieri , burdisso , ayala , heinze , sorin , rodriguez , mascherano , gonzalez , riquelme , saviola , crespo .
serbia-montenegro 's starting eleven jevric , duljaj , gavrancic , krstajic , dragutinovic , nadj , koroman , p. djordjevic , stankovic , milosevic , kezman .
the atmosphere is tense for this group c match .
argentina would be virtually through with a win , while a loss would likely doom serbia-montenegro .
the referee is roberto rosetti from italy .
1. min .
and we 're underway .
argentina have first possession .
3. min .
argentina begin strongly with a dangerous corner-kick .
5. min .
goal for argentina !
maxi rodriguez receives a beautiful pass in the box and holds his nerve to put the gauchos up 1-nil .
7. min .
koroman misses next match .
koroman tries to counterattack for serbia-montenegro , but fouls his opponent instead .
9. min .
djordjevic pulls a shot wide right of the net .
13. min .
free-kick for argentina , but sorin fails to capitalize .
16. min .
argentina : cambiasso for gonzalez 18. min .
kezman pushes the ball up the left , but a milosevic foul negates a nice cross .
20. min .
serbia-montenegro with more of the ball now , as argentina shift down a gear .
24. min .
promising free-kick for the gauchos , but krstajic clears .
25. min .
crespo a second too late on the ensuing corner-kick .
26. min .
albert nadj for holding .
28. min .
argentina back in form now with riquelme missing an open shot on goal .
30. min .
goal ! ! ! !
argentina lead 2-nil .
cambiasso scores after a fabulous multi-pass combination involving half of the gauchos ' midfield .
34. min .
argentinean celebrations in the stands , despair on the pitch for serbia-montenegro .
36. min .
crespo for playing on after off-sides call that negated a goal .
poor crespo , the linesman looks to have gotten that one wrong .
41. min .
goal ! ! !
argentina 3-nil .
saviola presses into the box , rodriguez cleans up for his second goal of the match .
42. min .
krstajic , who looked poor on argentina 's third goal .
45. min .
a late corner-kick for serbia-montenegro yields only frustration .
45. min . + 2 argentina with a deserved 3-nil lead after one of the most convincing halves of the tournament .
serbia-montenegro have more than a mountain to climb .
46. min .
serbia-montenegro start off the second half needing a major , major miracle .
46. min .
ergic for nadj 46. min .
milosevic tests abbondanzieri .
49. min .
lluboja for koroman 50. min .
crespo tries to get on the score sheet with a 15 meter blast , but jevric holds .
53. min .
the gauchos are showing no mercy here .
but riquelme fails to convert a free-kick from close in .
54. min .
milosevic fails to latch onto a promising cross in the box .
57. min .
serbia-montenegro are n't giving up , but they 're not creating many chances , either .
58. min .
tevez gives saviola a well-deserved break .
61. min .
argentina now seem content to show off their considerable ball handling skills in midfield .
65. min .
kezman 's day is done after taking out his frustration on mascherano .
66. min .
the only question now : will argentina punish 10-man serbia-montenegro ? 69. min .
vukic for milosevic serbia-montenegro are in damage-control mode .
73. min .
crespo brought down in the box , but no whistle from rosetti .
74. min .
young gun messi for man of the match rodriguez 77. min .
rare corner for serbia-montenegro , but no luck there , either .
78. min .
goal for argentina !
messi feeds crespo to add insult to injury .
81. min .
one spectator , in particular , must be happy - argentinean soccer legend , diego maradona , who 's in the stadium .
83. min .
and he 's not the only one .
argentina 's fans celebrate their team with choruses of ole !
ole ! 84. min .
another one for the gauchos !
tevez dribbles through two defenders and slides the ball into the net .
87. min .
ouch !
messi puts argentina up 6-nil !
it 's the youngster 's first world cup goal .
90. min . + 1 rosetti takes pity on serbia-montenegro , who were ripped apart 6-nil by a ferocious argentina squad .
argentina looks sure to progress to the next round . dw staff -lrb- cha -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

milosevic fails to latch onto a promising cross in the box .
57. min .
serbia-montenegro are n't giving up , but they 're not creating many chances , either .
58. min .
tevez gives saviola a well-deserved break .
61. min .
argentina now seem content to show off their considerable ball handling skills in midfield .
65. min .
kezman 's day is done after taking out his frustration on mascherano .
66. min .
the only question now : will argentina punish 10-man serbia-montenegro ? 69. min .
vukic for milosevic serbia-montenegro are in damage-control mode .
73. min .
crespo brought down in the box , but no whistle from rosetti .
74. min .
young gun messi for man of the match rodriguez 77. min .
rare corner for serbia-montenegro , but no luck there , either .
78. min .
goal for argentina !
messi feeds crespo to add insult to injury .
81. min .
one spectator , in particular , must be happy - argentinean soccer legend , diego maradona , who 's in the stadium .
83. min .
and he 's not the only one .
argentina 's fans celebrate their team with choruses of ole !
ole ! 84. min .
another one for the gauchos !
tevez dribbles through two defenders and slides the ball into the net .
87. min .
ouch !
messi puts argentina up 6-nil !
it 's the youngster 's first world cup goal .
90. min . + 1 rosetti takes pity on serbia-montenegro , who were ripped apart 6-nil by a ferocious argentina squad .
argentina looks sure to progress to the next round . dw staff -lrb- cha -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

live ticker : argentina 6:0 serbia and montenegro -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 16.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 25.04.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 16.06.2006 live ticker : argentina 6:0 serbia and montenegro review all the action from the match with the dw-world.de live ticker . the next match on dw-world.de 's live ticker argentina play serbia & montenegro in the first of the second round of group c matches .
a sell-out crowd of 52,000 is on hand in gelsenkirchen to watch favored argentina take on serbia-montenegro .
argentina 's starting line-up abbondanzieri , burdisso , ayala , heinze , sorin , rodriguez , mascherano , gonzalez , riquelme , saviola , crespo .
serbia-montenegro 's starting eleven jevric , duljaj , gavrancic , krstajic , dragutinovic , nadj , koroman , p. djordjevic , stankovic , milosevic , kezman .
the atmosphere is tense for this group c match .
argentina would be virtually through with a win , while a loss would likely doom serbia-montenegro .
the referee is roberto rosetti from italy .
1. min .
and we 're underway .
argentina have first possession .
3. min .
argentina begin strongly with a dangerous corner-kick .
5. min .
goal for argentina !
maxi rodriguez receives a beautiful pass in the box and holds his nerve to put the gauchos up 1-nil .
7. min .
koroman misses next match .
koroman tries to counterattack for serbia-montenegro , but fouls his opponent instead .
9. min .
djordjevic pulls a shot wide right of the net .
13. min .
free-kick for argentina , but sorin fails to capitalize .
16. min .
argentina : cambiasso for gonzalez 18. min .
kezman pushes the ball up the left , but a milosevic foul negates a nice cross .
20. min .
serbia-montenegro with more of the ball now , as argentina shift down a gear .
24. min .
promising free-kick for the gauchos , but krstajic clears .
25. min .
crespo a second too late on the ensuing corner-kick .
26. min .
albert nadj for holding .
28. min .
argentina back in form now with riquelme missing an open shot on goal .
30. min .
goal ! ! ! !
argentina lead 2-nil .
cambiasso scores after a fabulous multi-pass combination involving half of the gauchos ' midfield .
34. min .
argentinean celebrations in the stands , despair on the pitch for serbia-montenegro .
36. min .
crespo for playing on after off-sides call that negated a goal .
poor crespo , the linesman looks to have gotten that one wrong .
41. min .
goal ! ! !
argentina 3-nil .
saviola presses into the box , rodriguez cleans up for his second goal of the match .
42. min .
krstajic , who looked poor on argentina 's third goal .
45. min .
a late corner-kick for serbia-montenegro yields only frustration .
45. min . + 2 argentina with a deserved 3-nil lead after one of the most convincing halves of the tournament .
serbia-montenegro have more than a mountain to climb .
46. min .
serbia-montenegro start off the second half needing a major , major miracle .
46. min .
ergic for nadj 46. min .
milosevic tests abbondanzieri .
49. min .
lluboja for koroman 50. min .
crespo tries to get on the score sheet with a 15 meter blast , but jevric holds .
53. min .
the gauchos are showing no mercy here .
but riquelme fails to convert a free-kick from close in .
54. min .
milosevic fails to latch onto a promising cross in the box .
57. min .
serbia-montenegro are n't giving up , but they 're not creating many chances , either .
58. min .
tevez gives saviola a well-deserved break .
61. min .
argentina now seem content to show off their considerable ball handling skills in midfield .
65. min .
kezman 's day is done after taking out his frustration on mascherano .
66. min .
the only question now : will argentina punish 10-man serbia-montenegro ? 69. min .
vukic for milosevic serbia-montenegro are in damage-control mode .
73. min .
crespo brought down in the box , but no whistle from rosetti .
74. min .
young gun messi for man of the match rodriguez 77. min .
rare corner for serbia-montenegro , but no luck there , either .
78. min .
goal for argentina !
messi feeds crespo to add insult to injury .
81. min .
one spectator , in particular , must be happy - argentinean soccer legend , diego maradona , who 's in the stadium .
83. min .
and he 's not the only one .
argentina 's fans celebrate their team with choruses of ole !
ole ! 84. min .
another one for the gauchos !
tevez dribbles through two defenders and slides the ball into the net .
87. min .
ouch !
messi puts argentina up 6-nil !
it 's the youngster 's first world cup goal .
90. min . + 1 rosetti takes pity on serbia-montenegro , who were ripped apart 6-nil by a ferocious argentina squad .
argentina looks sure to progress to the next round . dw staff -lrb- cha -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

45. min . + 2 argentina with a deserved 3-nil lead after one of the most convincing halves of the tournament .
serbia-montenegro have more than a mountain to climb .
46. min .
serbia-montenegro start off the second half needing a major , major miracle .
46. min .
ergic for nadj 46. min .
milosevic tests abbondanzieri .
49. min .

crespo tries to get on the score sheet with a 15 meter blast , but jevric holds .
53. min .
the gauchos are showing no mercy here .
but riquelme fails to convert a free-kick from close in .
54. min .
milosevic fails to latch onto a promising cross in the box .
57. min .
serbia-montenegro are n't giving up , but they 're not creating many chances , either .
58. min .
tevez gives saviola a well-deserved break .
61. min .
argentina now seem content to show off their considerable ball handling skills in midfield .
65. min .
kezman 's day is done after taking out his frustration on mascherano .
66. min .
the only question now : will argentina punish 10-man serbia-montenegro ? 69. min .

73. min .

83. min .
and he 's not the only one .

ole ! 84. min .

87. min .
ouch !

it 's the youngster 's first world cup goal .
90. min . + 1 rosetti takes pity on serbia-montenegro , who were ripped apart 6-nil by a ferocious argentina squad .
argentina looks sure to progress to the next round . dw staff -lrb- cha -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 16.06.2006 live ticker : argentina 6:0 serbia and montenegro review all the action from the match with the dw-world.de live ticker . the next match on dw-world.de 's live ticker argentina play serbia & montenegro in the first of the second round of group c matches .
a sell-out crowd of 52,000 is on hand in gelsenkirchen to watch favored argentina take on serbia-montenegro .
argentina 's starting line-up abbondanzieri , burdisso , ayala , heinze , sorin , rodriguez , mascherano , gonzalez , riquelme , saviola , crespo .
serbia-montenegro 's starting eleven jevric , duljaj , gavrancic , krstajic , dragutinovic , nadj , koroman , p. djordjevic , stankovic , milosevic , kezman .
the atmosphere is tense for this group c match .
argentina would be virtually through with a win , while a loss would likely doom serbia-montenegro .
the referee is roberto rosetti from italy .
1. min .
and we 're underway .
argentina have first possession .
3. min .
argentina begin strongly with a dangerous corner-kick .
5. min .
goal for argentina !
maxi rodriguez receives a beautiful pass in the box and holds his nerve to put the gauchos up 1-nil .
7. min .
koroman misses next match .
koroman tries to counterattack for serbia-montenegro , but fouls his opponent instead .
9. min .
djordjevic pulls a shot wide right of the net .
13. min .
free-kick for argentina , but sorin fails to capitalize .
16. min .
argentina : cambiasso for gonzalez 18. min .
kezman pushes the ball up the left , but a milosevic foul negates a nice cross .
20. min .
serbia-montenegro with more of the ball now , as argentina shift down a gear .
24. min .
promising free-kick for the gauchos , but krstajic clears .
25. min .
crespo a second too late on the ensuing corner-kick .
26. min .
albert nadj for holding .
28. min .
argentina back in form now with riquelme missing an open shot on goal .
30. min .
goal ! ! ! !
argentina lead 2-nil .
cambiasso scores after a fabulous multi-pass combination involving half of the gauchos ' midfield .
34. min .
argentinean celebrations in the stands , despair on the pitch for serbia-montenegro .
36. min .
crespo for playing on after off-sides call that negated a goal .
poor crespo , the linesman looks to have gotten that one wrong .
41. min .
goal ! ! !
argentina 3-nil .
saviola presses into the box , rodriguez cleans up for his second goal of the match .
42. min .
krstajic , who looked poor on argentina 's third goal .
45. min .
a late corner-kick for serbia-montenegro yields only frustration .
45. min . + 2 argentina with a deserved 3-nil lead after one of the most convincing halves of the tournament .
serbia-montenegro have more than a mountain to climb .
46. min .
serbia-montenegro start off the second half needing a major , major miracle .
46. min .

dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 16.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 16.10.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 16.06.2006 dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the netherlands earned a spot in the round of 16 with the win with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor . a sell-out crowd packed the stands of stuttgart 's gottlieb daimler stadium to watch the netherlands take on ivory coast .
the dutch came into the group c match knowing that a win , thanks to argentina 's victory earlier in the day , would clinch a berth in the next round .
meanwhile , a loss for ivory coast would mean they would go home after their third match . with so much at stake , both sides started nervously , and there were no early goal chances .
that all changed in the 23rd minute , when netherlands forward robin van persie decided to take matters into his own hands , slashing laterally and drawing a free-kick just outside the penalty box .
van persie then slammed the ball home past keeper jean-jacques titié to put his side up by one . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the african " elephants " impressed in both their games but could n't grab any points not to be outdone , arjen robben capped a nice solo run four minutes later by finding ruud van nistelrooy .
van nistelrooy broke a long scoring drought and gave the oranjes a 2-0 lead . the ivory coast fought back and were rewarded in the 38th minute .
bakary kone pushed the ball up the right and slammed a rocket past dutch keeper edwin van der sar .
the score at half-time was 2-1 for the netherlands .
shortly before the whistle , there was bad news for the " elephants , " as their top goal-getter didier drogba picked up a yellow card .
he misses the next match . as to be expected , ivory coast were the more aggressive team in the second half , but they had major difficulties advancing the ball into the dutch penalty area .
the netherlands concentrated their efforts on defense , hoping to catch their opponents napping on a counter-attack . the best scoring chance came with roughly a quarter of hour left in regulation time .
the netherlands failed to deal with a well-struck ivory coast corner-kick , forcing van persie to chest the ball away on the line . but that was the only second-half situation in which the dutch goal was seriously under threat .
the netherlands get a deserved , if workmanlike 2-1 victory against one of africa 's best sides and are assured of progressing into the next round .
they meet argentina on june 21st to determine the winner of group c. ivory coast , on the other hand , will head home after their last match against serbia-montenegro . dw staff -lrb- cha -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de dutch to counter ivory coast threat with rampaging robben the netherlands go into friday 's group c match against ivory coast seeking a win that would almost certainly book their passage into the second round of the world cup .
-lrb- june 16 , 2006 -rrb- netherlands start world cup campaign with win confirming their palace as world cup title contenders , the netherlands opened with a dominating 1-0 win against serbia and montenegro sunday .
-lrb- june 11 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : netherland 2:1 ivory coast review all the action with the dw-world.de live ticker .
feedback what did you think of the game ?
send us an e-mail .

eu urges german regulator to step up telecoms competition -pipe- business -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 16.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 15.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de business -pipe- 16.06.2006 eu urges german regulator to step up telecoms competition großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : deutsche telekom is being targeted for unfair pricing by the eu the european commission has told germany that it must do more to shield consumers from high prices and bolster competition in the country 's fixed-line telecoms market , in which deutsche telekom has a 94 percent share . the commission said that the german telecoms regulator bundesnetzagentur should step up price controls to encourage greater competition and ensure consumers are protected from excessive prices charged by dominant operator deutsche telekom .
in a letter to the bundesnetzagentur , eu officials said telekom should be made to show exactly how it charges for calls , and if its prices are based on actual costs .
prices for telecommunications services are higher in germany than in most other eu countries .
commission spokesman martin selmayr told reporters that , with 94 percent of the fixed-line call market , deutsche telekom had " significant market power that needs to be regulated . "
" there is a problem of competition on the german fixed access market , " he said .
" the german telecoms regulator should use its powers under the eu telecom rules to impose efficient remedies on this market . "
suggested remedies fall short selmayr said that the eu information society and media commissioner viviane reding was not satisfied with the " remedies " put forward by the bundesnetzagentur so far .
last month , the regulator sent a proposal to brussels describing a plan to ask deutsche telekom to inform it of future prices .
" the commission does n't believe the proposal of remedies is sufficient , " he said .
" to achieve cost orientation we believe that … price regulation is necessary . "
bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : telekom 's planned new high-speed network has also come under fire the commission has also criticized deutsche telekom 's plans for a three-billion-euro -lrb- $ 3.56 billion -rrb- high-speed network , saying a new monopoly must not be created to replace the old and that the company must open up infrastructure to rivals .
as the eu recommendations are only " semi-binding , " germany is not required to fulfil them , but a national regulator must take " utmost account " of a request from brussels .
should the german regulator fail to implement brussels ' recommendations , germany could face breach of contract procedures based on eu telecoms legislation .
the procedure could lead to a lawsuit at the european court of justice .
according to the commission , other eu states including austria , ireland , the netherlands , and spain have already tackled a lack of competition in their retail phone markets . dw staff -lrb- dc -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de eu threatens legal action against germany over broadband germany appears determined to pass a new telecommunications law that critics say would give deutsche telekom a monopoly over broadband connections .
the eu has threatened legal action .
-lrb- may 18 , 2006 -rrb- eu threatens sanctions over protection request by telekom deutsche telekom wants to develop a faster dsl connection and says it needs protection from competitors to do so .
but the eu warned germany not to offer it .
-lrb- march 14 , 2006 -rrb- german government sells telekom stake to foreign " locust " the german state development bank kfw and the german government agreed monday to sell a 4.5 percent stake in deutsche telekom to us private equity firm blackstone for 2.68 billion euros -lrb- $ 3.3 billion -rrb- .
-lrb- april 24 , 2006 -rrb- feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply . radio news listen to world headlines from the top of the hour .
european business week listen to the latest edition of european business week labor market foreign employees as companies search for skilled workers , politicians look for ways to lure foreigners to germany .

bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : telekom 's planned new high-speed network has also come under fire the commission has also criticized deutsche telekom 's plans for a three-billion-euro -lrb- $ 3.56 billion -rrb- high-speed network , saying a new monopoly must not be created to replace the old and that the company must open up infrastructure to rivals .
as the eu recommendations are only " semi-binding , " germany is not required to fulfil them , but a national regulator must take " utmost account " of a request from brussels .
should the german regulator fail to implement brussels ' recommendations , germany could face breach of contract procedures based on eu telecoms legislation .
the procedure could lead to a lawsuit at the european court of justice .
according to the commission , other eu states including austria , ireland , the netherlands , and spain have already tackled a lack of competition in their retail phone markets . dw staff -lrb- dc -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de eu threatens legal action against germany over broadband germany appears determined to pass a new telecommunications law that critics say would give deutsche telekom a monopoly over broadband connections .
the eu has threatened legal action .
-lrb- may 18 , 2006 -rrb- eu threatens sanctions over protection request by telekom deutsche telekom wants to develop a faster dsl connection and says it needs protection from competitors to do so .
but the eu warned germany not to offer it .
-lrb- march 14 , 2006 -rrb- german government sells telekom stake to foreign " locust " the german state development bank kfw and the german government agreed monday to sell a 4.5 percent stake in deutsche telekom to us private equity firm blackstone for 2.68 billion euros -lrb- $ 3.3 billion -rrb- .
-lrb- april 24 , 2006 -rrb- feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply . radio news listen to world headlines from the top of the hour .

for more information , please click here .

eu urges german regulator to step up telecoms competition -pipe- business -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 16.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 22.03.2011 home news germany europe world asia business 125 years automobile science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de business -pipe- 16.06.2006 eu urges german regulator to step up telecoms competition großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : deutsche telekom is being targeted for unfair pricing by the eu the european commission has told germany that it must do more to shield consumers from high prices and bolster competition in the country 's fixed-line telecoms market , in which deutsche telekom has a 94 percent share . the commission said that the german telecoms regulator bundesnetzagentur should step up price controls to encourage greater competition and ensure consumers are protected from excessive prices charged by dominant operator deutsche telekom .
in a letter to the bundesnetzagentur , eu officials said telekom should be made to show exactly how it charges for calls , and if its prices are based on actual costs .
prices for telecommunications services are higher in germany than in most other eu countries .
commission spokesman martin selmayr told reporters that , with 94 percent of the fixed-line call market , deutsche telekom had " significant market power that needs to be regulated . "
" there is a problem of competition on the german fixed access market , " he said .
" the german telecoms regulator should use its powers under the eu telecom rules to impose efficient remedies on this market . "
suggested remedies fall short selmayr said that the eu information society and media commissioner viviane reding was not satisfied with the " remedies " put forward by the bundesnetzagentur so far .
last month , the regulator sent a proposal to brussels describing a plan to ask deutsche telekom to inform it of future prices .
" the commission does n't believe the proposal of remedies is sufficient , " he said .
" to achieve cost orientation we believe that … price regulation is necessary . "
bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : telekom 's planned new high-speed network has also come under fire the commission has also criticized deutsche telekom 's plans for a three-billion-euro -lrb- $ 3.56 billion -rrb- high-speed network , saying a new monopoly must not be created to replace the old and that the company must open up infrastructure to rivals .
as the eu recommendations are only " semi-binding , " germany is not required to fulfil them , but a national regulator must take " utmost account " of a request from brussels .
should the german regulator fail to implement brussels ' recommendations , germany could face breach of contract procedures based on eu telecoms legislation .
the procedure could lead to a lawsuit at the european court of justice .
according to the commission , other eu states including austria , ireland , the netherlands , and spain have already tackled a lack of competition in their retail phone markets . dw staff -lrb- dc -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de eu threatens legal action against germany over broadband germany appears determined to pass a new telecommunications law that critics say would give deutsche telekom a monopoly over broadband connections .
the eu has threatened legal action .
-lrb- may 18 , 2006 -rrb- eu threatens sanctions over protection request by telekom deutsche telekom wants to develop a faster dsl connection and says it needs protection from competitors to do so .
but the eu warned germany not to offer it .
-lrb- march 14 , 2006 -rrb- german government sells telekom stake to foreign " locust " the german state development bank kfw and the german government agreed monday to sell a 4.5 percent stake in deutsche telekom to us private equity firm blackstone for 2.68 billion euros -lrb- $ 3.3 billion -rrb- .
-lrb- april 24 , 2006 -rrb- feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply . radio news listen to world headlines from the top of the hour .
